choose.when: INSERT INTO SC_COMMENT(BBSCHOICE, SEQ, USERID, BBSSEQ, CONTENT, REGDATE) VALUES(1, SC_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{bbsseq}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO SC_COMMENT(BBSCHOICE, SEQ, USERID, PDSSEQ, CONTENT, REGDATE) VALUES(2, SC_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{pdsseq}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO SC_COMMENT(BBSCHOICE, SEQ, USERID, REVIEWSEQ, CONTENT, REGDATE ) VALUES(3, SC_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{reviewseq}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO SC_COMMENT(BBSCHOICE, SEQ, USERID, NOTICESEQ, CONTENT, REGDATE ) VALUES(4, SC_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{noticeseq}, #{content}, SYSDATE)

mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, USERID, CONTENT, REGDATE, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM SC_USER SU WHERE SU.ID = SC_COMMENT.USERID) NICKNAME FROM SC_COMMENT WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
